Question: Guangzhou Jindu Digital Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangzhou Jindu Digital Co.,Ltd

Product: CES 2024 Highlights

- Chinese tech companies highlighted their latest achievements in cutting-edge technologies at CES 2024, showcasing artificial intelligence, next-generation semiconductor display, autonomous driving, robots, and augmented reality.
- TCL demonstrated over 120 intelligent hardware pieces including quantum dot mini-LED TVs, AI processing chips, smartphones, intelligent AR goggles, and vehicle-mounted display products, aiming to expand its presence in North America.
- Hisense Group unveiled its latest ultra light-emitting diode (ULED) TV and laser display technology, emphasizing continuous technological advancements in sports, education, and medical fields.
- Lenovo Group Ltd introduced a full lineup of over 40 new devices and solutions powered by AI, anticipating the advent of AI-based PCs.
- Xpeng AeroHT showcased its pilotless flying car, an electric vertical takeoff and landing (eVTOL) aircraft, highlighting Chinese tech companies' global technological innovation leadership in AI, consumer electronics, intelligent devices, and electric vehicles.
